extendedInfo.description: Acting as a car blackbox, dash cam or auto DVR, DailyRoads Voyager continuously records videos and captures photos during your journeys. The app automatically records everything, but only important events are retained for future reference or as evidence. You get to choose what to keep, simply by touching the screen, even while you drive.Key features:- Continuous video recording, with user-defined length and video quality; sound can be included- User-defined storage space on the SD card with cyclic recording; i.e. the card never fills up- One-touch video retention allows you to keep video files for interesting road events during the whole journey- Auto retain video upon sudden shock (e.g. accident); configurable g-force sensitivity- Automatically capture photos at user-defined intervals and resolutions; great for time-lapse photography- Background video/photo capture, with optional buttons over other applications- Auto start and shutdown based on car dock detection and related options- Videos/photos are timestamped & geotagged- Automatically determine street address of retained videos/photos- Display videos/photos location on a map- Display speed, elevation, timestamp and GPS coordinates on videos/photos- Option to change speed units (km/h, mph) and date format- GPS can be disabled to reduce power consumption- Brightness adjustment option allows less distraction when driving at night- Built-in file manager, video/photo browser- Add title/description/bookmark to files- Upload files to DailyRoads.com- App2SD- Languages: English, Chinese, Russian, Korean, Spanish, Italian, Arabic, Dutch, Polish, HebrewThis is a free application without ads. Enjoy and have a safe journey!Working combinations of video settings on various phone models:http://www.dailyroads.com/voyager/stats.phpReviews: http://www.dailyroads.com/voyager/reviewsKeywords: vehicle blackbox, dashcam, auto DVR, road surveillance, traffic recorder, travel recorder, video event recorder, VER, VEDR, photo, time lapse photography, accident, crash, traffic accident, road incident, road trip, g-force, accelerometer, GPS, car mount

reviews.title: Just what I wanted
reviews.comment: This is a great tool.  It is perfect. Current used is high on Nexus 4, so had to purchase a 12v USB adapter rated at 3500ma... My old 1000ma one couldn\'t supply power fast enough to prevent discharge.  Update 1: Since Android 4.3 this has been less reliable. There are frequent error messages about being unable to save and the app can stall in background mode. Please fix, I love this app. Update 2 - I\'ve performed a factory reset and this is now more stable. I tend to run WAZE in the foreground with DailyRoads; JourneyLog and Torque OBD II in the background. A lot of work for a little phone - but a really cool combination.
reviews.author: Clifford Russell

reviews.title: too heavy processing.
reviews.comment: Makes a recording, but looks like too heavy processing. Even on charger, cannot keep the battery charge, in like an hour battery dead. Getting too hot and shut down when reach a 50C. Uploads to server only (for fee), directly transferred files does not contain and data(time, speed, location...) Cannot use:-( SEx10i.
reviews.author: Val Perchenok

reviews.title: New issues causing concern
reviews.comment: Recently an update has changed the close app process. new options on close but on exit it causes all my apps to open one after the other and the only way to stop it is to reboot. Samsung Google nexus.
reviews.author: George McKay

reviews.title: No longer works
reviews.comment: Used to work fine,  but not after the last update, bo matter the video format.  I keep getting the message to change video settings or encoder.
reviews.author: Sakis c

reviews.title: I like
reviews.comment: Makes my Samsung Nexus get toasty warm, but all in all probably best free dash can app out there. Well done to thee creators. And good improvements in latest patch.
reviews.author: marcel scott

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app but when in landscape position it will only work one way as if your turn the phone around all text is upside down. Due to the camera position on my galaxy s3 I do need my phone the other way so not too good
reviews.author: Steven Swarbrick

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: New update works perfectly for Nexus 4 on 4.3!
reviews.author: Allen Jun

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Overall, it does what it says pretty well. A few minor issues - if using audio recording as well, the \"ding\" when the next file starts disables any music playing until I pull the cable out and plug it back in. Really annoying while driving. Only other issue is that it consumes battery even when plugged in, and causes the device to get hot - but that is not really something that can be resolved, especially since I\'m running multiple apps at one time.
reviews.author: Jason Dale

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Perfect app for what it does. Best one I\'ve tried for sure. The video format is perfect as well.   The last updated added a rather annoying exit popup prompt however - would like the option to disable that for the previous quick and clean exit.
reviews.author: Raidy Loq

reviews.title: Very needful thing!
reviews.comment: Please remember to donate. I was going to buy an expensive car dash camera, but this app does the car black box video recording better!  Remember to donate! Works fine on huawei honor u8860, even while running waze in background.
reviews.author: Petri Niemi

reviews.title: Works Great, when it works
reviews.comment: The app works very well, recording not only dash-cam footage but a GPS track so you can see exactly where the video was recorded as well as the speed information.  I have two issues with this app on my Nexus 4. The first is that when I tap the screen to retain a video I get a pop-up message saying that the video couldn\'t be retained and I should check the card - even though the video is retained.  The second, more significant issue is that it\'s constantly crashing on my Nexus 4 now and is basically unusable. It\'s currently refusing to start and fails with \'unable to initialise camera\' - even when having restarted the Nexus.  Without these issues I\'d have no problem giving this 5 stars.
reviews.author: Rob Clark

reviews.title: Used to Love it, not anymore
reviews.comment: This is a very handy app that used to work quite well.  From the start I\'ve had an issue with it that my phone (Motorola Photon Q) running this app actually uses more power than the dock can provide, and gets quite warm using it.  I estimate that on a long drive of several hours the phone would end up with a dead battery.  Another issue is the inability to upload to a different web site for storage.  I have my own servers, and would like to FTP copies of the files there, or to a service like Flickr or Photobucket.  The final nail in the coffin is that recently the developer\'s site has stopped working properly, and no longer seems able to convert files and add overlays.  That part is a paid service, purchased (either as credits or monthly unlimited) within the app.  The failure to deliver what you paid for is considered fraud, and I will be filing claims and complaints against the developer with both Google and Paypal.  No one likes a thief, and charging for something not delivered is theft.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best tool out there for accident evidence.
reviews.comment: This app has improved greatly since I started using it a few years ago on my DroidX. Once it is setup, it is pretty reliable and does what I need it to do: Record trips in case someone hits me on the road. There are a few minor annoyances/issues which take off a star. [1] The main screen requires landscape view (settings do not), which feels clunky when I open the app to change settings in portrait mode. [2] Latest update caused video recording to fail repeatedly until I reset the data (and settings) for the app. I then had to redo all my configurations. Other than these minor annoyances, the app is well built and now worth a donation (will do soon).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app that needs a couple tweaks
reviews.comment: This app does a great job, especially because it is free. I did have a lower rating but the latest update fixed my biggest issue. There are a few things that I would recommend to make this a 5 star app:  1. Make rotation automatic, using the phone\'s sensors rather than having to manually select the orientation in the settings.   2. Create a better way to silence the beeps between video files. There is a setting for this but it is essentially muting all sounds on the phone which doesn\'t work for me because I stream media from the phone in the car.  3. Make the overlay buttons even smaller when running in background mode and even better, allow each button to be positioned independently.
reviews.author: Andrew Lloyd

reviews.title: Two years later still loving it!
reviews.comment: It\'s great for catching those totally random events that you see on your daily commutes. As for the refresh looking good so far but I noticed the option to place the retain button vertically is missing. I personally like to have it at the top middle so it doesn\'t interfere with Waze. Right now it\'s stuck in the middle of my screen with an \"expand\" button above it that doesn\'t do anything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: After reading through the many positive reviews I was hopeful this would work on my Nexus 4 without a hitch. Unfortunately I have only ever seen app main screen once (when I first opened the app). Now I never see more than a black screen which hangs for around 10 seconds before the \"Dailyroads isn\'t responding\" dialogue box. I\'d change my settings in app but I can\'t see anything. I\'m using 4.3 and have no ROM present.  Shame. This sounded good
reviews.author: Chris Daws

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I am using this app for the last 3 months and it\'s awesome.. only issue I am facingwas \" when ever I record video in background mode, the recorded video is not having GPS , speed or elevation information.. but I am able to see this info when I recorded it in non - background mode... \". FYI I generally use this app in background mode and continue recording while locking screen to save on my battery . \" ... Anyway awesome guys. Thanks a lot ..
reviews.author: balakrishna thati

reviews.title: Brings phone to a halt
reviews.comment: Makes my phone so slow when the app it open. Attempting the record causes all kind of issues. Run better on my old Evo 4g.
reviews.author: Joey Dobbertin

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I am so glad this app is still being supported and updated! I am using it on a daily basis. Never had a problem with it, except the 1080p resolution recording problems on Galaxy S3. I hope this is fixed with this update :)
reviews.author: Very Nice Person
